title: Bryan Smyth (rugby league)
text:
Bryan Smyth is a <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1990s. He played at representative level for <a href="Ireland%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Ireland</a>, and at club level for <a href="Illingworth%20A.R.L.F.C.">Illingworth</a> <a href="Illingworth%20ARLFC">ARLFC</a> (in <a href="Halifax%2C%20West%20Yorkshire">Halifax</a>, of the <a href="Pennine%20League">Pennine League</a>), as a .
International honours.
Smyth won three caps for <a href="Ireland%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Ireland</a> while at Illingworth in 1995.
